name: Lance Prism Star
effect:
You can play this card only if 1 of your Pokémon was Knocked Out during your opponent’s last turn.
Search your deck for up to 2 {N} Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.
author: kodama
rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
